content: **sundae granny baby blanket crochet pattern** create a timeless and cozy baby blanket with the sundae granny baby blanket pattern this beginner-friendly crochet pattern features a simple one-row repeat that s easy to learn and quick to complete perfect for creating thoughtful gifts or heirloom pieces the playful scoops and cherries design offers a charming soda-shop-inspired look with an open lacy texture perfect for a variety of occasions this versatile pattern works well with any yarn or color combination allowing you to create a blanket that s as unique as your vision **pattern features** * **difficulty level** beginner-friendly * **one-row repeat** easy to memorize and fun to crochet * **customizable size** make it as small or large as you d like * **written instructions** simple clear and easy-to-follow **materials needed** * worsted weight yarn ~500-600g for a 34 x 40 blanket * crochet hook 6mm recommended * stitch markers scissors and yarn needle whether you re making a stroller-sized baby blanket or a larger project the sundae granny blanket comes together effortlessly download the pattern today and create a heartfelt gift that will be treasured for years to come ✅ free pattern https //bit ly/3f18qdx ✅ printable pdf pattern https //bit ly/3inohka ✅ right handed tutorial https //youtu be/_tngpyfrnl0 ✅ left handed tutorial https //youtu be/fjmhjvakgn4
